text: vedavisvasikalilearu vibhagam niyearu ‎svarnakkumparam tanne visvasiccelpiccalum at ‎tiriccutarunnavaran. marrearu vibhagamunt. kevalam ‎oru dinar visvasiccelpiccalpealum ninakk ‎avarat matakkittarilla- ni nirantaram ‎pintutarnnalallate. atinu karanam avarinnane ‎vadiccukeantirikkunnatan: "i niraksararute ‎karyattil nannalkk kurramuntavanitayilla." avar ‎beadhapurvam allahuvinre peril kallam ‎parayukayan. ‎
